block.happierghasts.dried_ghast.descript: A dry block that when submerged in water will slowly regenerate into a Ghastling.
entity.happierghasts.happy_ghast.descrip: A passive mob grown from a Dried Ghast that can be tempted with Snowballs and ridden with a Harness.
